hiveArticle.title: Photography - Water Droplets on Glass Window
hiveArticle.body:
So it's raining here in Bangalore, India. Its the best time to capture some photos and also be little creative. 

In my last post I said that we want to be little creative in any think you do , so today I try to be little creative with my Mobile Camera.

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/nj5d5y2owe.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/l6s2vey6u2.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vmcs7bgo3i.jpg)

<hr>

##### Camera - Nokia 6, No Editing

<hr>

##### Follow @codingdefined
